name: Oth
description: Oth is a Large Aberration with remarkable resilience, possessing solid natural armor. It is capable of adopting traits that enhance its combat versatility, either as a Dripping Arcanist or a Paladin of Shoth.
memorable: Oth can choose between powerful spellcasting and blinding enemies with sacred light, making it a multifaceted threat.
goals: Oth serves its purpose based on its chosen trait—either wielding potent magic or shielding allies with sacred light.
relations: Related to the Shoth, Oth may encounter creatures of similar or allied nature.
environment: Usually found in diverse terrains, adaptable to various combat environments.
strengths: Resistances to acid, cold, and fire damage provide it with an edge against elemental attacks.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity limits its evasiveness in combat scenarios.
attacks: Oth can make multiattack with oozing slam, dealing bludgeoning and additional acid damage, or wield a greatsword for higher slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to cast fireball once a day allows Oth to deliver significant area damage.
senses: Oth has blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 15, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
skills: Oth is proficient in persuasion, allowing it to influence others significantly.
additional_information: Amorphous trait allows movement through narrow spaces without squeezing.
Can merge hit points with other Shoth allies to increase survivability.
Capable of blinding nearby foes with its Paladin of Shoth trait.
Includes potent spellcasting abilities with verbal components only.
Strong Charisma makes Oth a compelling figure in both combat and social interactions.
spellcasting: Oth can cast various spells, notably fire bolt and fireball, relying on its high Charisma for spellcasting.
test_queries: creature that merges hit points with allies
amorphous monster that can squeeze through tight spaces
